DOC.brief_summary: This study aim examine dimensional alveolar ridge alteration prevent buccal plate resorption soft tissue recession follow immediate implant placement extraction socket maxillary esthetic zone use different socket morphology-guided treatment modality . Expected result study : - To find optimal material GBR procedure modalities buccal plate resorption degree reduction ; - Soft tissue recession best esthetic result achievement . There possibility study socket morphology influence final esthetic result achievement .
DOC.detailed_description: Aim study : examine dimensional alveolar ridge alteration prevent buccal plate resorption soft tissue recession follow immediate implant placement extraction socket maxillary esthetic zone use different socket morphology-guided treatment modality . Objectives : - To evaluate extraction socket buccal plate resorption rate among patient group immediate implant placement simultaneously guide bone regeneration ( GBR ) method use different type bone graft material . - To evaluate esthetic outcome use Complex Esthetic Index ( CEI ) ( Appendix 3 ) correlate initial buccal plate thickness soft tissue biotype assess immediate implant placement simultaneously GBR . - To recommend appropriate method prevention buccal plate resorption , soft tissue recession esthetic result achievement follow immediate implant placement extraction socket maxillary esthetic zone . Methods Patients sample : - Selection patient sufficient extraction socket immediate dental implant installation guide bone regeneration ( GBR ) procedure . - Assessment extraction socket do use classification extraction socket base upon soft hard tissue component treatment ( Appendix 2 ) . Result analysis Size research : Sixty patient referred oral implantologist Kaunas , Vilnius , Granada , Ankara city need immediate implant esthetic zone . There 2 group patient : 1 . Group I patient ( n = 30 ) treat immediate implant GBR use xenogenic bone graft material ; 2 . Group II patient ( n = 30 ) treat immediate implant GBR use allogenic bone graft material . Expected result : After study , hope find optimal material GBR procedure modalities buccal plate resorption degree reduction , soft tissue recession best esthetic result achievement . There possibility study socket morphology influence final esthetic result achievement . Funds : Private sponsorship , company sponsorship ( Straumann Botiss Dental ) . Detailed Protocol After patient selection step present study ( press Ctrl-Enter go directly select step ) : Step 1 . Clinical examination documentation Conventional clinical examination do . Orthopantomograph standardize periapical radiograph register every patient . Informed consent sign . Additionally acrylic stent fabricate subject . This stent fix incisal edge adjacent teeth take consideration plan acrylic temporary tooth space . The stent provide three buccal/lingual pair consistent measurement point implant site locate 4 , 7 , 10 mm summit alveolar soft tissue . One aperture 1 soft tissue margin . We insert aperture 1 cylinder constant length contact prominent implant transfer part . Then assistant add acrylic composite resin aperture fix cylinder strongly template way . Thus constant distance point 1 implant collar ( 5 6mm accord need ) . Step 2 . Tooth extraction Following local anesthesia , teeth gently extract , use 15c blade , periotomes , elevator forceps , minimize fracture socket wall . Sites thoroughly degranulated proper visualization clinical assessment socket morphology . Step 3 . Socket assessment classification Below overview extraction socket classification ( Appendix 2 Figure 1 ) . As state , classification derive present soft hard tissue variable . 1 . Soft tissue contour variation ; 2 . Vertical soft tissue deficiency ; 3 . The keratinized gingival ( KG ) width mid-buccal side socket ; 4 . Mesial distal papilla appearance 5 . Gingival tissue biotype ; 6 . Soft tissue quality ; 7 . The height alveolar process ; 8 . Available bone beyond apex extraction socket ; 9 . Extraction socket labial plate vertical position ; 10 . Extraction socket facial bone thickness ; 11 . Presence extraction socket bone lesion ; 12 . Intra-dental bone peak height ( interproximal bone height ) ; 13 . The mesio-distal ( M-D ) distance adjacent ; 14 . Palatal angulation . All linear measurement perform close 1 mm use periodontal probe . All measurement do two surgeon mean calculate . Step 4 . Dental implant placement . All implant place optimal three dimensional position . Dental implant place cingulum position ( line adjacent teeth ) plan implant tooth incisal edge position line adjacent teeth incisal edge . In ideal position , implant collar 2 mm cementoenamel junction adjacent teeth apicocoronally 3-4 mm bellow plan soft tissue margin , least 1.5 mm away adjacent teeth mesiodistally . After placement optimal dental implant remain gap implant surround bony wall least 2 mm need GBR buccal plate outside socket . Step 5 . Implant position alveolar bone assessment : 1 . Bone front implant width ; 2 . Bucco-lingual ridge width ; 3 . Vertical residual gap ; 4 . Implant apico-coronal position . Step 6 . The remain defect augmentation base propose scheme . Flapless surgery apply consequently GBR application place inside socket . The remain defect dehiscence implant placement fill , use two type bone graft material : Group I - natural bovine bone graft material + resorbable natural soft tissue membrane Group II - process human allograft + resorbable natural soft tissue membrane . In future call Group II control group . Resorbable membrane condense bone graft without pressure fix provisional crown . Conventional medicament treatment include Chlorhexidine 0.2 % oral rinse twice daily 2 week apply . Step 7 . The provisional crown fixation . Individualized provisional acrylic crown fabricate operation adapt fixed temporary abutment implant insertion initial implant stability 35 Ncm insertion torque . The provisional crown cement temporary cement . If implant fails achieve initial stability 35 Ncm insertion torque , provisional acrylic crown would bond neighboring teeth . In case , provisional crown exclude occlusion . After 6 month , provisional restoration replace permanent cement screw-retained zirconia crown . Step 8 . Final prosthetic treatment After 6 month , provisional restoration replace permanent cement zirconia crown fix zirconia abutment . Patients follow : Patients rechecked two time : 6 month 1 year implant treatment . Step 10 . Complex Esthetic Index ( CEI ) anterior maxillary implant support restoration This complex esthetic index compose three component : soft tissue index ( S ) , predictive index ( P ) implant support restoration index ( R ) ( Appendix 1 ) . Appendix 1 . Clinical documentation sequence : 1 . Preoperative picture mouth area patient , include smile line 2 . Clinical preoperative picture defect area ( approximately 4 teeth picture ) 3 . Preoperative orthopantomography periapical X-ray 4 . Extraction tooth 5 . Socket measurement caliper probe 6 . Operation area ready implantation 7 . Implant placement 8 . Bone substitute application 9 . Resorbable membrane application 10 . Clinical situation right surgery provisional crown 11 . Clinical situation postoperative 1 week ( available ) 12 . Clinical situation postoperative 6 month without provisional crown ( incisal edge frontal view projection ) 13 . Clinical situation postoperative 6 month permanent crown ( incisal edge frontal view projection ) 14 . Follow-up 6 month periapical X-ray 15 . Alveolar process measurement caliper probe 16 . Clinical situation postoperative 1 year treatment ( incisal edge frontal view projection ) 17 . Follow-up 1 year periapical X-ray 18 . Alveolar process measurement caliper probe Appendix 2 . DOC.criteria: General health satisfactory Singletooth replacement maxillary anterior segment Extraction socket Type I Type II ( Juodzbalys et al . ) Nonadjacent implant sit prosthetic restoration Patient wear kind removable prosthesis treatment area ; Availability complete clinical record . Uncontrolled diabetes Immunodeficiency diseases Heavy smoker ( 10 cigarette day ) Untreated periodontal disease .
